prompts: What are you looking forward to this week?
What have you been thinking of doing but have been putting off?
What do you enjoy about your job?
What are you the possibility of today?
What do you know? Want to know?
Who's someone that inspires you? Why?
What's something painful that you've experiened?
How did you spend your time this past week/weekend?
If you didn't have to worry about people's opinions, money, what would you do with your life?
What's the next thing that you want to learn? To what degree?
What's a book you wish someone would right?
Who do you want to serve?
